solution_line_template: If Sid attended four times as many college courses as Max, he attended {multiplier_sid}*{max_courses}=<<{multiplier_sid}*{max_courses}={sid_courses}>>{sid_courses} college courses.
The total of college courses they both attended is {sid_courses}+{max_courses} = <<{sid_courses}+{max_courses}={total_courses}>>{total_courses}
